SimVenture 2020

Scenery updated to v1.3, latest incremental update July 22 16:00PST
Installation

  1. Install OpensceneryX with the optional static aircraft and HD Forests selected. You can also download the complete compressed package here: OpenSceneryX.zip

    Warning: If you already have OpenScenryX installed, please rerun the installer and verify you are updated and have the otional static aircraft and forest replacement selected.
  2. Install the event scenery SimVenture 2020 v1.3.zip 1.5G, last modified July 22th 2020
  3. Afer unzipping the event scenery, drag the folder into your Custom Scenery directory of X-Plane 11. If you had a previous version of this scenery, remove it!
What is this?

This scenery is a slightly modified fork of the fantastic scenery KOSH EAA AirVenture Oshkosh 2.7

The focus of these changes are to offer a consistent experience between connected users flying a specific scenario based VFR arrival procedure into KOSH. The biggest changes include replacing the existing draped ortho imagery, slightly extending the original bounds, and adding additional locations that are critical VFR reporting points. Generally scenery development minimizes this imagery in order to not interfere with other installed scenery or custom mesh + ortho imagery added by the user. In this context, we do want these areas to take priority so pilots are all looking at the same thing.

The ortho imagery included in this library is still very limited and does not cover the entire arrival. This is intentional in order to respect any custom scenery you may be running for the area. To get full route coverage you can install the optional Ortho4Xp package from Ortho tab

Ripon area

Google imagery, ZL19

Fisk, Fisk Ave, KOSH

KOSH uses Bing ZL19, Fisk Google ZL19, Fisk Ave Bing ZL18

Optional Ortho4XP coverage

These bundled packages include more extensive photo realistic ortho imagery along the route. There are two versions you can pick from. The normal version includes both Bing/Google imagery of at least ZL 18, and ZL 19. The UltraHD version is even more aggressive with ZL19 along the arrival. The overlays are provided by the main Simventure 2020 scenery package, but only for the extended arrival route. If you plan on flying through these tiles, but outside the focus area, the default overlays are included at the bottom of this page. Most people won't need these.

Installation
  1. pick zPE or zPE_UHD
  2. download ALL the .7z.00X files to a single directory
  3. after all files are downloaded, double click on the xx.7z.001 file. This will extract a single folder from the split .7z compressed files. You will need 7zip installed to uncompress these files.
  4. drop the folder into your Custom Scenery.
  5. download, unzip, the overlays at the bottom yOrtho4XP_Overlays
  6. start x-plane
  7. quit x-plane
  8. open scenery_packs.ini and put zPE(_UHD) at the bottom, and yOrtho4XP_Overlays above it.

  • Added object priorties to better respond to number of real world objects graphics setting. Users facing FPS issues can now use level two and three in order to lower the CPU demand at KOSH
  • Replaced Dot4.png, Dot6.png, Dot8.png
  • Refined Data+43-089.mesh to include OSM data for unclassified road networks in order to have Fisk Ave included in the base mesh
  • Added GO2 ZL18 draped ortho imagery along Fisk Ave - w/ @KevinM
  • replaced OSHwittmPalet1.png with "2020" - @Marcusmmc
  • Included HD tree resources in the scenery package as it's an optional install for openscenery x.
